name: Peter Andersen
what_you_do: Andersen Life Stories offers personalized video recording services to capture life stories and family traditions through relaxed, enjoyable sessions in the comfort of clients' homes.
who_you_serve: The service is aimed at individuals and families looking to preserve their life stories and cherished memories for future generations.
